attributes.action: Want  our right to vote on Lisbon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All we hear is the MPs banging on about expenses and the economy.
With the recent elections it seems like there is short term memory loss by MPs.
I voted conservative for the first time in my life.
Give us a vote on Lisbon as was part of the Labour Manifesto.
